application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required for Conditions 5 (Construction Method Statement) and 12 (Sustainable Drainage) of planning permission 20/01103/FUL (Sub-division of plot following demolition of garage and construction of 2 x semi-detached houses (1 x three-bedroom and 1 x four-bedroom) and associated amenity space, parking and refuse facilities; addition of garage door to front elevation of existing house and replacement of flank window with side door)
decision_conditions: The applicant is advised of the need to secure all necessary Highways licenses (scaffolding, hoarding etc). They should also note that no construction-related vehicles are permitted to park on Herne Road even where no general parking restrictions are in operation. If new services connections are required the applicant should contact the Highways NRSWA Team at the earliestopportunity to apply for the necessary permit.https://www.kingston.gov.uk/highway-licencesReason : in the interests of highway safety and the free movement of traffic
